about_the_game:
Become a great graffiti artist and work your way to success! Have you always wanted to learn how to paint graffiti? Now you can do it in our Spray Master simulator. Move from one city to another and paint street art on walls, trains, garages, stations, abandoned buildings and other backgrounds. But be careful, the police may catch you! Draw your name, famous symbols and signs. Expand your skills in drawing aerosol art. Become the world's most famous graffiti creator! You can do it all in this graffiti painting simulator! Run at night in your hoodie and scarf and hide from the police like a real urban ninja.


How it works.

Story:
You are a young hooded graffiti artist who has a big dream to become famous. You begin your journey in your hometown in Rochester. You are starting to get good at what you do, the locals admire you. It's time to create your own brand and sign your street art. You proudly sign it “Graffiti Ninja”. You decide to move to another city and battle other famous graffiti masters. Try to be better than them and don't get caught by the police! Focus on painting increasingly beautiful spray cans. Mix paints, add more layers, change graffiti fonts. Who knows what city the next one will be in. Check it out!


Features:
Paint graffiti based on your new stencil idea on paper. You have a spray art sketch. Important:
- don't mix up the colors,
- don't go beyond the edges of the drawing,
- try to draw as accurately as possible.
- share your artwork with friends, create wallpapers from it or save it on your device.
- Paint almost the entire alphabet and other symbols on the wall step by step. Draw letters and full words.

But be careful:
- you have limited time!
- remember that spray paint is toxic, sometimes you have to break between applications.
- if you take too long to paint, you will get caught!


This is not another photo editor or generator. This game is different, you can learn how to paint graffiti and have fun at the same time. It's more like the idea of a spray-paint mogul.

Remember that every wall is different. You have a different graphic idea for each one. Sometimes inspiration will come and sometimes it won't. Sometimes you will draw text, sometimes animals, symbols, love, heart signs or other, depending on your mood. You need to listen to your emotions and draw what they are telling you.

In the game you will find walls in different cities.

You constantly need to improve your spray cans and graffiti tools. Remember, without this it will be difficult to finish the game.

name: Graffiti Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 1 GB ОЗУ MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030, Radeon RX 550, GeForce GTX 1050, Radeon RX 560 и GeForce GTX 1630
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: This game is perfect for not powerful computers!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 1 GB ОЗУ MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030, Radeon RX 550, GeForce GTX 1050, Radeon RX 560 и GeForce GTX 1630
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: This game is perfect for not powerful computers!

short_description: Become a great graffiti artist and work your way to success! Have you always wanted to learn how to paint graffiti? Now you can do it in our Graffiti Simulator.

English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Spanish - Latin America*, Simplified Chinese*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian, Ukrainian*, Japanese*, Bangla*, Persian*, Hindi*
